subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: While the Colorado Rockies’ 1-3 start might make the legions of born-again believers suddenly nervous, there remains a tight connection and belief in the power of last September and October.
snippet: While the Colorado Rockies’ 1-3 start might make the legions of born-again believers suddenly nervous, there remains a tight connection and belief in the power of last September and October.
